players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I am shocked Diana is dead — we should share alibis. I was quiet last night. Who was beside me during the evening?"
You: "I investigated Bob last night and learned they're the mafioso. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "That's a serious claim, Alice. Can you share exactly what your investigation revealed and when you did it? Bob, why were you quiet last night?"
Bob: "I didn't do anything last night — Alice, your claim makes no sense."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and my result was 'mafia'. I made the claim now because Diana's death fits a night kill and we need to act to stop more losses."

Charlie: "I don't trust unverified claims. Alice, can you say who you investigated on night 1 and why you waited to speak? Bob, your silence doesn't prove anything — what can you say to counter Alice's specific accusation?"
